required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study to Investigate the Drug-drug Interactions (DDIs) Between SKLB1028 and Midazolam in Healthy Subjects
clinical_study.official_title: A Single-center, Open-label, Phase I Drug-drug Interaction Clinical Study to Investigate the Effect of SKLB1028 on the Pharmacokinetics of Midazolam in Healthy Subjects

lead_sponsor.agency: CSPC ZhongQi Pharmaceutical Technology Co., Ltd.

clinical_study.source: CSPC ZhongQi Pharmaceutical Technology Co., Ltd.

brief_summary.textblock: This is a single-center, open-label phase I clinical study to investigate the effect of SKLB1028 on the pharmacokinetics of Midazolam and its metabolite 1'-OH-midazolam in healthy subjects. This study also aims to evaluate the safety and tolerability of SKLB1028 in the presence of Midazolam.

detailed_description.textblock: This study aims to characterize the drug-drug Interactions (DDI) potential of SKLB1028 with the sensitive index substrate drug (Midazolam) in Healthy Subjects. The study consists of a screening period (Day -14 to Day -2), a baseline period (Day -1), a treatment period, and a follow-up visit period.

primary_outcome.measure: Maximum concentration (Cmax)of Midazolam and its metabolite 1'-OH-midazolam
Area under the concentration-time curve (AUC) from 0 to the last measurable concentration (AUC0-t) of Midazolam and its metabolite 1'-OH-midazolam
AUC extrapolated to infinity (AUCinf) of Midazolam and its metabolite 1'-OH-midazolam

secondary_outcome.measure: Time to Cmax (Tmax) of Midazolam and its metabolite 1'-OH-midazolam
Terminal elimination half-life (t1/2) of Midazolam and its metabolite 1'-OH-midazolam
Apparent Clearance (CLz/F) of Midazolam
Apparent volume of distribution (Vz/F) of Midazolam
Number of participants with treatment-related adverse events as assessed by CTCAE v5.0
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Throughout the study period, with an average of 10 days

secondary_outcome.measure: Clinically significant changes from baseline in routine blood test were recorded as AEs at each visit time point.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Throughout the study period, with an average of 10 days
secondary_outcome.description: Routine blood test included cell count (white blood cells, platelets, basophils, eosinophils, neutrophils, lymphocytes and monocytes) in 10^9/L.

secondary_outcome.measure: Clinically significant changes from baseline in routine blood test were recorded as AEs at each visit time point.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Throughout the study period, with an average of 10 days
secondary_outcome.description: Routine blood test included red blood cell count in 10^12/L.

secondary_outcome.measure: Clinically significant changes from baseline in routine blood test were recorded as AEs at each visit time point.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Throughout the study period, with an average of 10 days
secondary_outcome.description: Routine blood test included hemoglobin in g/L.

secondary_outcome.measure: Clinically significant changes from baseline in blood biochemistry test were recorded as AEs at each visit time point.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Throughout the study period, with an average of 10 days
secondary_outcome.description: Blood biochemistry test included total bilirubin and serum creatinine in Î¼mol/L.

secondary_outcome.measure: Clinically significant changes from baseline in blood biochemistry test were recorded as AEs at each visit time point.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Throughout the study period, with an average of 10 days
secondary_outcome.description: Blood biochemistry test included alanine aminotransferase, aspartate aminotransferase, alkaline phosphatase and creatine kinase in U/L.

secondary_outcome.measure: Clinically significant changes from baseline in blood biochemistry test were recorded as AEs at each visit time point.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Throughout the study period, with an average of 10 days
secondary_outcome.description: Blood biochemistry test included total protein and albumin in g/L.

secondary_outcome.measure: Clinically significant changes from baseline in blood biochemistry test were recorded as AEs at each visit time point.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Throughout the study period, with an average of 10 days
secondary_outcome.description: Blood biochemistry test included total cholesterol, triglyceride and blood glucose in mmol/L.

secondary_outcome.measure: Clinically significant changes from baseline in routine urine test were recorded as AEs at each visit time point.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Throughout the study period, with an average of 10 days
secondary_outcome.description: Routine urine test included urobilinogen, protein, glucose and ketones (positive or negative).

secondary_outcome.measure: Clinically significant changes from baseline in routine urine test were recorded as AEs at each visit time point.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Throughout the study period, with an average of 10 days
secondary_outcome.description: Routine urine test included pH value and specific gravity.

secondary_outcome.measure: Clinically significant changes from baseline in coagulation function test were recorded as AEs at each visit time point.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Throughout the study period, with an average of 10 days
secondary_outcome.description: Coagulation function test included prothrombin time and activated partial thromboplastin time in seconds.

secondary_outcome.measure: Clinically significant changes from baseline in coagulation function test were recorded as AEs at each visit time point.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Throughout the study period, with an average of 10 days
secondary_outcome.description: Coagulation function test included antithrombin III as percentage.

secondary_outcome.measure: Clinically significant changes from baseline in coagulation function test were recorded as AEs at each visit time point.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Throughout the study period, with an average of 10 days
secondary_outcome.description: Coagulation function test included fibrinogen in g/L.

secondary_outcome.measure: Clinically significant changes from baseline in 12-lead electrocardiogram (ECG) examination were recorded as AEs at each visit time point.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Throughout the study period, with an average of 10 days
secondary_outcome.description: ECG monitoring included heart rate in bpm.

secondary_outcome.measure: Clinically significant changes from baseline in 12-lead electrocardiogram (ECG) examination were recorded as AEs at each visit time point.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Throughout the study period, with an average of 10 days
secondary_outcome.description: ECG monitoring included P-R, QRS, QT and QTcF in ms.

secondary_outcome.measure: Clinically significant changes from baseline in vital signs examination were recorded as AEs at each visit time point.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Throughout the study period, with an average of 10 days
secondary_outcome.description: Vital signs monitoring included body temperature in degrees Celsius.

secondary_outcome.measure: Clinically significant changes from baseline in vital signs examination were recorded as AEs at each visit time point.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Throughout the study period, with an average of 10 days
secondary_outcome.description: Vital signs monitoring included respiratory rate and pulse in times per minute.

secondary_outcome.measure: Clinically significant changes from baseline in vital signs examination were recorded as AEs at each visit time point.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Throughout the study period, with an average of 10 days
secondary_outcome.description: Vital signs monitoring included systolic blood pressure and diastolic blood pressure in mmHg.

secondary_outcome.measure: Clinically significant changes from baseline in physical examination were recorded as AEs at each visit time point.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Throughout the study period, with an average of 10 days
secondary_outcome.description: Physical examination included general conditions, skin, mucous membranes, head, neck, chest, abdomen, spine, limbs, nervous system, and lymphatic system.

arm_group.arm_group_label: The DDI of SKLB1028 and Midazolam
arm_group.description: Eligible subjects received a single dose of Midazolam 15 mg on Day 1, and took a single dose of Midazolam 15 mg and a single dose of SKLB1028 150 mg with dosing interval of 0.5 h on Day 3.

intervention.arm_group_label: The DDI of SKLB1028 and Midazolam
The DDI of SKLB1028 and Midazolam

facility.name: Beijing Friendship Hospital, Capital Medical University
